column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Part of Bavette's allure is that they don't imitate other steakhouses.  There's no muscular power-lunch ambience here; the décor is elaborate and sophisticated yet casual
column2: dimly lit and oh-so-romantic.  The smaller downstairs room
column3: reached by a delightfully spooky stairway with flickering candles
column4: feels as exclusive and intimate as a private club.  The menu is unique
column5: focusing on steak but also offering several dishes atypical of steakhouses plus options that you just don't find on menus everywhere.
